Food with Matt.title: Food with Matt
Food with Matt.description: Matt has been eating my snacks withough asking me first and it's really frustrating.

moods.comment: I talked to him today about the issue.
His behavior has not changed at all!
I just wish he could at least ask me first.

Food with Matt.advice1: If the issue is not serious, wait a few more days and observe behavior
Food with Matt.advice2: Mention the issue, but be sure not to place blame
Food with Matt.advice3: Communicate your concerns and why it is important to you
Food with Matt.q1: Have you been able to observe any additional behavior?
